title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Move beyond reactive: Transform cloud ops with AWS DevOps Agent (COP362)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 超越被动响应：使用 AWS DevOps Agent 转型云运维 (COP362)
abstract: Is your operations team consumed by daily firefighting? Do you lack the time to evaluate and improve your operational posture? Move from reactive firefighting to proactive operational improvement with AWS DevOps Agent, a frontier agent that resolves and proactively prevents incidents, continuously improving reliability and performance of applications in AWS, multicloud, and hybrid environments. We’ll show you how you can leverage AWS DevOps Agent to integrate with your DevOps toolset including AWS and non-AWS observability tools, code repositories, and pipelines to correlate and connect the dots across signals to surface concerning trends and provide prioritized improvements to drive operational excellence.
abstract_cn: 您的运维团队是否疲于应对日常救火？您是否缺乏时间来评估和改进运维状况？借助 AWS DevOps Agent，从被动救火转向主动运维改进。这是一个前沿智能体，可解决并主动预防事件，持续改进 AWS、多云和混合环境中应用程序的可靠性和性能。我们将向您展示如何利用 AWS DevOps Agent 与您的 DevOps 工具集成，包括 AWS 和非 AWS 可观测性工具、代码仓库和流水线，以关联和连接各种信号，发现令人担忧的趋势，并提供优先级改进建议，从而推动卓越运维。
